name: Square Word-Christmas Edition
description:
SquareWord - ChristmasEdition

Santa’s elves are sick so his cats are preparing Christmas instead! Santa is asking you to help them and make sure everything will go alright! 

Found the letters, organise the words in this funny word game!

Play it alone or with all the family around the computer!

  • Play 110 levels spread in 14 different categories!
  • All categories are unlock from the start!
  • Play EASY or EXTREME difficulty!
  • Use different hints to help you and collect gifts to have more!
  • Complete 12 extra objectives!
  • Connect every day for the Daily Puzzle (100+ available)
  • Auto-save: leave and restart the last puzzle in the same exact state of completion.
